summary: Backend changes introduce a Motoko migration that filters out job postings titled “Frontend Developer”, “Backend Developer”, and “Mobile App Developer” during canister upgrade, and wires this migration into backend/main.mo. However, the diff summary shows no changes to the Careers page frontend rendering, so the frontend requirement to hide those job cards on /careers is not evidenced as implemented. Additionally, project_state.json was modified without being requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Careers page Open Positions list rendering so that the three selected job cards for “Frontend Developer”, “Backend Developer”, and “Mobile App Developer” are not shown on /careers (no layout gaps/placeholders).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary contains only backend Motoko changes and a project_state.json update; no frontend Careers page/Open Positions/job-card rendering changes are shown, so there is no evidence the UI stops rendering those cards.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata/versioning in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove specific job postings from the Careers page and backend getAllJobs(); it does not request modifying project_state.json.
